    • Field Detail

      • sName

        public java.lang.String sName
        Name of axis; either "sample" or "observation".

    • Method Detail

      • addMetadata

        public void addMetadata(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> mapMetadata)
        Take a dictionary of metadata and add it to axis.
        Parameters:
        mapMetadata - Map in which keys are axis element IDs, values are maps between metadata headings and values.

      • addMetadataFromTextFile

        public void addMetadataFromTextFile(java.lang.String sMetadataPath,
                           java.lang.String[] rgsFields)
        Adds metadata from a text file.
        Parameters:
        sMetadataPath - Path to file with metadata. Formatted according to http://biom-format.org/documentation/adding_metadata.html. Must include "id" field.
        rgsFields - Metadata keys to add. If Keys are not found in the metadata file they will not be added.

      • getID

        public java.lang.String getID(int iIndex)
        Gets the ID of the axis element associated with the specified index.
        Parameters:
        iIndex - Index of axis element.
        Returns:
        ID of observation or sample.

      • getIDs

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getIDs()
        Return the ids along the given axis.
        Returns:
        Set of IDs of elements on axis.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(java.lang.String sID)
        Get the index of a specified sample or observation along axis.
        Parameters:
        sID - Identity of the sample or observation whose index will be returned.
        Returns:
        Index of sample or observation.

      • getMetadata

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getMetadata(int iIndex)
        Get the metadata of the identified sample or observation.
        Parameters:
        iIndex - Index of axis element (i.e., sample or observation).
        Returns:
        Map in which keys are metadata headings, values are metadata values.

      • getMetadata

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getMetadata(java.lang.String sID)
        Get the metadata of the identified axis sample or observation.
        Parameters:
        sID - ID of axis element (i.e., sample or observation).
        Returns:
        Map in which keys are metadata headings, values are metadata values.

      • getMetadataKeys

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getMetadataKeys()
        Returns all metadata keys for axis.
        Returns:
        Set of all metadata keys for axis.

      • hasMetadataField

        public boolean hasMetadataField(java.lang.String sKey)
        Checks whether elements of axis have specified type of metadata.
        Parameters:
        sKey - Type of metadata.
        Returns:
        True if elements have metadata field; false otherwise.

      • removeAllMetadata

        public void removeAllMetadata()
        Clears all metadata.
